scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=@react-mfe-federation/app1 && npm run build --workspace=@react-mfe-federation/app2 && npm run build --workspace=@react-mfe-federation/app3 && npm run build --workspace=@react-mfe-federation/shell
scripts.start-all-concurrently: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=client/app1" "npm run dev --workspace=client/app2" "npm run dev --workspace=client/app3" "npm run dev --workspace=@react-mfe-federation/shell"
scripts.preview-all: npm run build && concurrently "npm run preview --workspace=@react-mfe-federation/app1" "npm run preview --workspace=@react-mfe-federation/app2" "npm run preview --workspace=@react-mfe-federation/app3" "npm run preview --workspace=@react-mfe-federation/shell"
